Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein From Lee Plourde To James Petrucci, Marti Licon-Vitale Date 2019/08/16 20:20 Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ---------- Original message --------- From: b6(b)(6) @bop.gov> Date: 8/16/19 6:57 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Lee Plourde b6(b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein >>> b6(b)(6), b6(b)(7)(C) 08/16/2019 18:57 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
---------- Original message ----------
From: Nancy Ayers b6(b)(6) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/16/19 5:4
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
>>> "Nancy Ayers" b6(b)(6) @bop.gov> 08/16/2019 17:45 >>> b6(b)(6) hold off on this - no need to respond... I have given b6(b)(6) guidance....we'll handle it.. thanks Nancy Ayers Chief, Office of Public Affairs Federal Bureau of Prisons U.S. Department of Justice 202-514 b6(b)(6) >>> BOP-IPP/Public Affairs 8/16/2019 5:34 PM >>> b6(b)(5) Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax b6(b)(6), b6(b)(7)(C) @tmz.com> 8/16/2019 5:05 PM >>> Do you have the results of his autopsy? Page 2494 DOJ-OGR-00023723

text_blocks.content:
Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
From Lee Plourde
To James Petrucci, Marti Licon-Vitale
Date 2019/08/16 20:20
Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
---------- Original message ---------
From: b6(b)(6) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/16/19 6:57 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lee Plourde b6(b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein

>>> b6(b)(6), b6(b)(7)(C) 08/16/2019 18:57 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
---------- Original message ----------
From: Nancy Ayers b6(b)(6) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/16/19 5:4
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein

>>> "Nancy Ayers" b6(b)(6) @bop.gov> 08/16/2019 17:45 >>>
b6(b)(6) hold off on this - no need to respond... I have given b6(b)(6) guidance....we'll handle it.. thanks

Nancy Ayers
Chief, Office of Public Affairs
Federal Bureau of Prisons
U.S. Department of Justice
202-514 b6(b)(6)

Office of Public Affairs
Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 514-6551 - phone
(202) 514-6620 - fax

b6(b)(6), b6(b)(7)(C) @tmz.com> 8/16/2019 5:05 PM >>>
Do you have the results of his autopsy?

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as b6(b)(6), b6(b)(7)(C), and b6(b)(5). The content is an email chain discussing a media inquiry from TMZ regarding the autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein.
